ja485:6.1: Osīdi → osadhi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | osaṭṭhi (mr) | osati (abhinavaṭīkā) | osīdati (?), dukkhaṃ → dukkhaṃ me (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja485:8.1: Vassamiva sare pāde → vassaṃva sare pāde (bj) | vassaṃva sare pabbatapāde (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja485:9.1: Pāpo khosi → pāposi kho (bj) | pāpo kho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja485:12.4: mayha kāmā hi → mayhaṃ kāmāhi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mayhaṃ kāmā (mr)
ja485:17.2: Tā ca giriguhāyo tatheva tiṭṭhanti →  tā ca giriguhāyo (sī1, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja485:29.1: Vande te → te pāde (bj, sya2ed), ayirabrahme → ayyire brahme (mr)
